Definition: Traffic (YTD) measures the cumulative number of circular views across all campaigns year-to-date providing total exposure volume
Why_Important: Essential baseline metric for measuring overall campaign reach and brand visibility; tracks aggregate performance trends over time

Definition: Visitors (YTD) counts unique individuals who have viewed circulars year-to-date measuring actual audience reach beyond repeat views
Why_Important: Shows true audience penetration and market coverage; key for understanding brand awareness and customer acquisition effectiveness

Definition: Marketing Health (YTD) is a composite score measuring overall circular program effectiveness combining engagement quality and audience growth
Why_Important: Single north-star metric for marketing performance; indicates program health and optimization opportunities across all campaigns

Definition: YTD Shopper Reach counts unique shoppers reached across all campaigns year-to-date measuring cumulative audience penetration
Why_Important: Shows total market reach achieved; critical for understanding brand awareness growth and campaign scale effectiveness

Definition: YTD Engagement Volume measures total interactions (views clicks adds) across all campaigns year-to-date
Why_Important: Quantifies cumulative engagement activity; indicates overall program momentum and shopper interest trends

Definition: YTD Add-to-List Total counts all add-to-list actions across campaigns year-to-date measuring conversion volume
Why_Important: Tracks cumulative conversion performance; directly correlates with downstream purchase intent and revenue impact

Definition: YTD Lift from Promotions measures incremental sales generated by promotional campaigns year-to-date versus baseline
Why_Important: Quantifies total promotional ROI; demonstrates concrete business value and revenue attribution of marketing efforts

Definition: YTD ROI on Promotions calculates return on investment ratio for promotional spend year-to-date (sales lift / promotion costs)
Why_Important: Essential profitability metric; shows financial efficiency of promotional investments and guides budget allocation

Definition: Pulse Score distills engagement into a single score for a circular blending exposure and actions into one comparable measure
Why_Important: Single north-star score summarizing circular engagement; fast quality read for overall performance
Inquiry_Description: Pulse Score Deep Dive - Engagement Performance

Definition: Engagement Rate measures the percentage of circular viewers who took an action like clicking a promotion or adding to list
Why_Important: Quantifies circular effectiveness by showing conversion from exposure to action; key metric for optimization

Definition: Audience Reach is the count of unique shoppers who saw the circular measuring actual footprint rather than just views
Why_Important: Defines circular footprint with transparent audience sizing for clear campaign reach assessment

Definition: Trend Overview plots composite scores over the last four weeks to visualize momentum
Why_Important: Shows short-term momentum up/down; helps spot patterns quickly for early trend identification

Definition: Promotion Position Performance shows how promotions are distributed by position quartiles (Top/Upper-Mid/Lower-Mid/Bottom) in the circular
Why_Important: Surfaces positional bias impacting performance; enables fair comparison by normalizing for layout effects

KPI_Title: Store Lift â€” Engagement vs Lift
Definition: Store Lift compares engagement rates across stores to identify outperformers and laggards relative to average performance
Why_Important: Highlights stores exceeding or falling behind expectations; informs field operations and localization strategies

Definition: Category Performance highlights which product categories shoppers engage with most ranked by add-to-list conversion rates
Why_Important: Identifies best and worst performing categories; informs merchandising priorities and category mix decisions

Definition: Category Lift vs Baseline shows which categories over/under-perform vs their historical average highlighting seasonal effects and category momentum
Why_Important: Identifies categories gaining or losing traction; enables proactive merchandising adjustments and inventory planning
Data_Points: Lift percentage vs baseline by category

Definition: Category Size vs Engagement Quality plots traffic volume against engagement rate with conversion as bubble size to identify high-opportunity categories
Why_Important: Reveals underperforming high-traffic categories and niche performers; guides resource allocation and promotional focus
Data_Points: Traffic volume vs engagement rate by category

Definition: Category Contribution Lift shows what percentage of total promotional lift comes from the top-performing category
Why_Important: Identifies category dependencies and concentration risk; guides diversification strategy and category investment priorities
Inquiry_Description: Top Category Contribution to Total Lift

Definition: Top Performing Categories ranks categories by their composite performance scores highlighting best and worst performers
Why_Important: Prioritizes category focus areas; reveals which categories drive most value and should receive increased promotional support

Definition: Category ATL Rate measures the average add-to-list conversion rate across all product categories
Why_Important: Benchmarks category performance expectations; helps identify categories with conversion optimization opportunities

Definition: Category Trend shows performance momentum for top categories over the past 4 weeks revealing directional changes
Why_Important: Identifies category momentum shifts; enables proactive response to emerging trends and declining performance
Data_Points: Performance scores over 4 weeks by category

Definition: Promotion Performance ranks promotions based on composite or percentile scores
Why_Important: Ranks promotions by overall engagement; answers what's hot this week for optimization and storytelling

Definition: Circular Heat Map visualizes density of shopper attention across positions in the circular layout using impression data
Why_Important: Shows where design placement impacts outcomes; aids layout optimization and position strategy decisions

Definition: Top Quartile Promotions shows the percentage of promotions performing in the top 25% of all campaigns
Why_Important: Measures promotional execution quality; higher percentages indicate better creative and strategic excellence

Definition: Promotion-Level Sales Lift measures incremental sales generated by individual promotions versus their baseline performance
Why_Important: Identifies star-performing promotions; guides creative replication and optimization strategies for maximum impact

Definition: Promotion Size Impact compares engagement and performance across different promotion card sizes (small medium large)
Why_Important: Optimizes layout decisions; shows return on footprint investment and guides size allocation strategy

Definition: Promotion Media Freshness measures the percentage of promotions using current up-to-date creative assets and messaging
Why_Important: Ensures content relevance and quality; fresh assets typically drive higher engagement and conversion rates

Definition: Size Class Mix shows the proportion of promotions by card size (Small/Medium/Large) to understand design footprint strategy
Why_Important: Provides context for performance comparison; shows how much space each size class occupies in the layout

Definition: Best Performing Size Class highlights which card size drives the most add-to-list actions relative to impressions received
Why_Important: Quantifies ROI of footprint decisions; supports optimal size allocation and design layout choices

Definition: Expanded Interaction Rate measures the percentage of promotion cards that were expanded or interacted with by shoppers
Why_Important: Indicates content engagement depth; helps optimize card design for maximum interaction potential

Definition: Deal Type Effectiveness compares performance across different promotional offer types (BOGO discounts etc.)
Why_Important: Identifies which deal structures resonate most with shoppers; guides promotional strategy decisions

Definition: Shared Promotions counts how many promotions were shared externally by shoppers through social or messaging platforms
Why_Important: Measures viral potential and organic reach amplification; identifies content that resonates beyond paid exposure

Definition: Share Open Rate shows the percentage of shared promotion links that were actually opened by recipients
Why_Important: Measures effectiveness of shared content; indicates quality and relevance of virally distributed promotions

Definition: Share Add-to-List Rate measures conversion from shared promotions showing percentage of share opens that led to list adds
Why_Important: Quantifies end-to-end viral conversion; demonstrates business impact of social sharing and word-of-mouth marketing
